TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyValueChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供 的 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者變更指定為屬性的值時，就會發生事件，請在。The event occurs when the user changes the value of a property, which is specified as a , in a . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`PropertyGrid1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PropertyGrid1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#530](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#530)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#530](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#530)]

summary.span: 格線項目在變更之前的數值。

span.span: The value of the grid item before it was changed.
A object representing the old value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性提供屬性的值是在套用變更之前。This property provides you with the value of the property as it was before the change was applied. 您可以藉由查詢使用指定的屬性方格中尋找新值。You can find the new value by querying the property grid with the specified . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`PropertyGrid1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `PropertyGrid1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
